alert.note: Alert for Cheyenne (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 02 at 8:22PM CDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Yuma County in northeastern Colorado, northwestern Cheyenne County in northwestern Kansas and southwestern Dundy Counties in southwestern Nebraska through 745 PM MDT/845 PM CDT/... At 722 PM MDT/822 PM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Wray, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Haigler. This includes Highway 385 between mile markers 227 and 246. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
